content.title: Root Font Size
content.tooltip: The root font size for the document. Typically 62.5% or 100%.

content.title: Desktop Base Size
content.tooltip: The size of your H4 heading on desktop. All other heading sizes are calculated from this value.

content.title: Mobile Base Size
content.tooltip: The size of your H4 heading on mobile. All other heading sizes are calculated from this value.

content.title: Desktop Ratio
content.tooltip: The degree of difference between heading sizes on desktop (up/down keys cycle through music scales).

content.title: Mobile Ratio
content.tooltip: The degree of difference between heading sizes on mobile (up/down keys cycle through music scales).

content.title: Default Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your heading font-family output.

content.title: Default Heading Color
content.tooltip: The default color of your headings.

content.title: Default Line Height
content.tooltip: The space between heading lines.

content.title: Default Font Weight
content.tooltip: The weight (boldness) of your headings.

content.title: Default Letter Spacing
content.tooltip: The space between characters in your headings.

content.title: Default Max-Width
content.tooltip: The width at which line breaks will occur in your headings.

content.title: Default Font Style
content.tooltip: The font style of your headings (italic, oblique, etc.).

content.title: Default Text Transform
content.tooltip: The case of your headings (uppercase, lowercase, etc.).

content.title: Default Text Wrap
content.tooltip: The wrapping behavior of your headings ('wrap' = normal)

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h1 font-family output.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for H1 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for H1 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h2 font-family output.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for H2 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for H2 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h3 font-family output.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for H3 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for H3 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h4 font-family output.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for H4 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for H4 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h5 font-family output.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for H5 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for H5 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h6 font-family output.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for H6 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for H6 headings. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Desktop Base Size
content.tooltip: The size of your 'M' & default text. All other text sizes are calculated from this value.

content.title: Mobile Base Size
content.tooltip: The size of your 'M' & default text. All other text sizes are calculated from this value.

content.title: Desktop Ratio
content.tooltip: The degree of difference between text sizes (up/down keys cycle through music scales).

content.title: Mobile Ratio
content.tooltip: The degree of difference between text sizes (up/down keys cycle through music scales).

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your heading font-family output.

content.title: Default Text Color
content.tooltip: The default color of your text.

content.title: Default Line Height
content.tooltip: The space between lines of text.

content.title: Font Weight
content.tooltip: The weight (boldness) of your text.

content.title: Letter Spacing
content.tooltip: The space between characters in your text.

content.title: Max-Width
content.tooltip: The width at which line breaks will occur in your paragraphs.

content.title: Font Style
content.tooltip: The font style of your text (italic, oblique, etc.).

content.title: Text Transform
content.tooltip: The case of your text (uppercase, lowercase, etc.).

content.title: Text Wrap
content.tooltip: The wrapping behavior of your text ('wrap' = normal)

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for XXL text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for XXL text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for XL text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for XL text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for L text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for L text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for M text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for M text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for S text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for S text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Desktop Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default desktop font size for XS text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.title: Mobile Size Override
content.tooltip: Override the default mobile font size for XS text. Leave blank to use the default size based on your chosen type scale.

content.text: If you want to use custom font files, you can configure them here. This will output the @font-face rules and tokens for your custom fonts.

content.title: Font Type
content.tooltip: Is this font a static font or variable font?

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: The name of your font (can be anything you'd like).

content.title: Font File Path
content.tooltip: The file path to your custom font. Use a relative path only.

content.title: Font Format
content.tooltip: The font format (e.g. woff2, woff, ttf) for this font.

content.title: Font Style
content.tooltip: The font-style value for this font.

content.title: Font Weight
content.tooltip: The font-weight value for this font. Make sure it matches the actual file you referenced.

content.title: Font Display
content.tooltip: The font-display value for this font.

content.title: Font Stretch
content.tooltip: The font-stretch value for this font.

content.title: Font Variation Settings
content.tooltip: Font variation settings for this variable font.

content.text: It's good practice (but not required) to include a fallback font. This will ensure that your font is displayed if the custom font fails to load.

content.title: Font File Path
content.tooltip: The file path to your fallback font. Use a relative path only.

content.title: Font Format
content.tooltip: The font format (e.g. woff2, woff, ttf) for this font.
